name: Mr. Coward Who Always Does the Wrong things
name_original: Mr. Coward Who Always Does the Wrong things
description:
Mr.Coward Who Always Does the Wrong things is a strategic rock paper scissors style card in which you Play as a maniac person and.... ah who gives a shit about all this description. 

Basically(and do that suspension of disbelief thingy here because its a jam game and I still wasn't able to explain that 'deep lore' and 'character motivations' in the time)

you bad, you crazy, you play card game with old people, you blast their kneecaps away if they lose, if you lose... well you gotta lose to find out what happens.

Note - Please find out what happens when you lose and when they lose, I actually spent alot of time working on those animation(even though they're pretty shitty) T_T kthanksbye
